adHeader: Experienced House Sitter (no charge) & Pet Sitter
adDetails: I am an experienced, professional, reliable and trustworthy house sitter/pet sitter for cats and dogs. I have experience with different breeds of felines and canines; they seem to find me irresistible. In addition, I am well versed in house sitting and will care for your plants in your absence. I have excellent references which I will provide at which point we determine this may be a good fit. My references speak to the quality of my character and excellent work in managing homes and pet care. I look forward to hearing from you soon. Thank you for reading my post. House sitting: No charge Daily rate for pet sitting: TBD based on responsibilities and number of pets Excellent References: Upon out meeting Location: South Bay & Pennisula Contact: via email Keywords: Housesitter, House-sitter, House sitter, Petsitter, Pet-sitter, Pet sitter
